entry.title: Silver 2017 Charms
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 9.00

C961S

Size: Length 3/4 inch x Height 1/2 inch

Silver 2017 Charms

Made in the USA.

Watchus's 2017 sterling silver plated charm can be used as a remembrance for school memory, weddings and any other affairs that holds deep memories for the year 2017.
